name: Orbit Friends
description:
Finding friends is never easy. It's even harder when you're a black hole that must consume everything and everyone who gets too close. 
This means having to keep your friends at a distance.

Will you be the one to help this lonely black hole in its search for friends?

Developed by:

Luisa Höhne - 2D Art & Animation
Simone Mayer - 2D Art & Animation
Annika Heilmann - UI & Sound Design
Vincent Krenzke - Programming

This game was developed in one week as part of a game jam.
